title: Add --quiet/-q flag for scripting
description: Add quiet mode to suppress progress messages for scripting. With -q flag, only output errors (to stderr) and final results. No emoji, progress messages, or tips.
close_reason: Infrastructure complete: created pkg/output utility, added --quiet/-q flag to root command, demonstrated usage in GetID function. Remaining work (updating all pkg/ print statements) tracked in prox-vho.

title: Implement context propagation throughout codebase
description: Functions create their own context.Background() instead of accepting context parameter. Pass context from CLI commands down through stack for proper cancellation support.

title: UX Improvements
description: Epic for tracking all user experience improvements. Includes new output formats, better error messages, shell completion, and professional CLI output.

title: Add environment variable support for credentials
description: Support PROX_URL, PROX_USER, PROX_PASSWORD environment variables as alternative to config file for CI/CD scenarios.

title: Code Quality Improvements
description: Epic for tracking all code quality improvements identified in codebase analysis. Includes error handling standardization, code duplication removal, constants extraction, and other refactoring work.

title: Implement client caching to reduce API calls
description: CreateClient() is called in every domain function, creating new authenticated client each time. Add client caching per session and reuse option for batch operations. Should improve performance and reduce authentication overhead.

title: Use filepath.Join for cross-platform path construction
description: pkg/config/config.go uses string concatenation for paths. Replace with filepath.Join() for cross-platform compatibility.

title: Add progress indicators for long operations
description: Long operations (clone, migrate) show no progress. Add progress bar or spinner for better UX during lengthy operations.

title: Make storage configurable instead of hardcoded
description: pkg/container/create.go:55 hardcodes 'local-lvm' storage. Make configurable via flag or config.

title: Add support for VM/CT tags filtering
description: Add ability to list/filter VMs and containers by Proxmox tags: 'prox vm list --tag production'.

title: Add package documentation comments
description: Add package-level documentation to pkg/conversion, pkg/node, cmd/node for better godoc output.

title: Add prox vm/ct exec command
description: Add ability to execute commands inside VMs/containers directly: 'prox ct exec mycontainer -- ls -la'. Useful for quick operations without SSH.
close_reason: Not feasible: Proxmox VE API does not provide endpoints for executing commands inside LXC containers (pct exec is CLI-only). For VMs, qemu-guest-agent exec is available but requires guest agent installation and configuration changes (guest-exec must be removed from RPC blacklist). The practical solution for users is to use SSH, which prox already supports via the 'prox ssh' command. Feature cannot be implemented without significant complexity and external dependencies.

title: Add version command with build info
description: Add 'prox version' command showing version, git commit, build date, and Go version. Use ldflags for build-time injection.

title: Replace boolean parameters with options struct
description: pkg/vm/list.go:89 ListVMs has multiple boolean parameters making calls confusing. Replace with ListOptions struct for clarity and extensibility.

title: Improve help text organization
description: Group commands by category in help output: Virtual Machine Commands, Container Commands, Configuration, etc.

title: Performance Optimizations
description: Epic for tracking all performance optimization work. Includes parallel processing, caching strategies, connection pooling, and API call optimizations.

title: Add prox logs command
description: Add ability to view Proxmox task logs from CLI. Support UPID format and --follow flag for streaming logs.

title: Add nil pointer checks for VMID
description: pkg/vm/list.go:38 potential nil pointer dereference if resource.VMID is nil. Add nil checks before dereferencing.

title: Improve error messages with actionable advice
description: Technical error messages lack actionable advice. Add helpful suggestions for common errors (auth failures, connection issues). Include 'Run prox config setup' hints.

title: Implement exponential backoff for task polling
description: waitForTask implementations use fixed polling intervals. Implement exponential backoff starting at 500ms, max 5s for more efficient polling.

title: Add prox status command
description: Add command to check connection status and cluster health. Show connection URL, cluster name, node count, VM/CT counts with status breakdown.

title: Add --json output format for describe commands
description: Implement --json flag for vm describe, ct describe, and node describe commands to support machine-readable output for automation.

title: Optimize template search with index map
description: pkg/container/templates.go:170-182 uses linear search through all templates. Build index map for O(1) lookups by OS:version. Low effort, improves template resolution performance.

title: Standardize naming conventions for VM functions
description: Mixed naming: GetVm/ShutdownVm should be GetVM/ShutdownVM per Go acronym conventions. Standardize StopVM vs ShutdownVm terminology.

title: Fix missing error handling in config.go
description: pkg/config/config.go:25-26 silently ignores error from os.UserHomeDir(). Add proper error handling or fallback.

title: Add --wait flag for async operations
description: Some commands return immediately with task ID. Add --wait flag to block until operation completes and show duration.

title: Remove emojis for professional CLI output
description: Heavy emoji usage makes output feel casual. Remove emojis from all standard output across codebase. Use color for status if terminal supports it. Update files: pkg/vm/operations.go, pkg/vm/list.go, pkg/container/*.go, cmd/ssh.go, cmd/config/*.go, pkg/node/*.go

title: Define interfaces for Proxmox client
description: No interfaces defined for testing/mocking. Create ProxmoxClientInterface for better testability.

title: Fix typo: Comfig -> Config
description: pkg/config/config.go:12 has comment typo 'Comfig' instead of 'Config'. Simple fix.

title: Add configuration profiles support
description: Support multiple config profiles for different environments (homelab, production, etc). Allow switching with 'prox config use' or --profile flag.

title: Add shell completion support
description: Add tab completion for bash/zsh/fish/powershell. Cobra has built-in completion generation. Add completion command that generates shell-specific completion scripts.

title: Extract duplicate IP discovery logic
description: getVMIPFromGuestAgent and getContainerIPFromGuestAgent in pkg/client/client.go:711-794 and 900-983 have ~90% code duplication. Extract common IP extraction logic into shared helper function.

title: Add VM/CT name support for all commands
description: Some commands only accept VMID, not name. Ensure all commands (clone, migrate, etc) accept both name and ID consistently.

title: Fix redundant template API calls
description: pkg/container/templates.go:104-158 ResolveTemplate calls getClusterNodes and getNodeTemplates twice. Cache and reuse results.

title: Implement parallel IP lookups for VM listing
description: Sequential IP lookups in pkg/vm/list.go:65-74 cause N API calls taking ~100-500ms each. Implement goroutine worker pool (max 10 workers) for concurrent IP fetching. Expected 5-10x performance improvement for clusters with many VMs.

title: Add --json output format for all list commands
description: Add machine-readable JSON output option for scripting/automation. Implement --json flag for vm list, ct list, and other list commands. Output should be valid JSON array of objects.

title: Standardize error handling across codebase
description: Functions inconsistently use return vs os.Exit(1). Standardize on returning errors from domain functions (pkg/*) and let CLI layer (cmd/*) decide exit behavior. Makes code testable and library-friendly.

title: Consolidate VM/CT lookup functions
description: cmd/ssh.go:191 duplicates lookup logic from domain packages. Move findVMByNameOrID and findContainerByNameOrID to pkg/vm and pkg/container for reuse.

title: Add cluster resources caching
description: GetClusterResources() called frequently without caching. Add short-lived cache (5-10 seconds) to reduce redundant API calls.

title: Reorganize tests to follow Go conventions
description: Move test files from tests/ directory to *_test.go files adjacent to source following Go conventions.

title: Extract magic numbers into constants
description: Multiple magic numbers without constants across codebase. Create pkg/client/constants.go with HTTPTimeout, VMIDMin/Max, VMNameMaxLength, disk usage divisors, etc.

title: Replace manual type assertions with struct unmarshaling
description: pkg/client/client.go:302-360 uses extensive manual type assertion. Use direct JSON unmarshaling into structs for cleaner, safer code.

title: Complete quiet mode implementation across all commands
description: Infrastructure for --quiet/-q flag is complete (pkg/output, root command flag). Need to update remaining print statements across pkg/ to use output.Info(), output.Result(), output.Error() instead of fmt.Printf/Println. Files needing updates: pkg/vm/*.go, pkg/container/*.go, pkg/node/*.go, cmd/*.go

title: Configure HTTP transport for connection pooling
description: pkg/client/client.go:94-114 uses default http.Client settings. Configure transport with MaxIdleConns, MaxIdleConnsPerHost, IdleConnTimeout for better connection reuse.

title: Add --force flag and confirmation for destructive operations
description: Add confirmation prompts before deletion (vm delete, ct delete). Support --force flag to skip confirmation for automation. Prevents accidental deletions.

title: Pre-compile regex patterns for validation
description: pkg/client/validation.go:31 compiles regex on every validation call. Compile once at package level for better performance.

title: Add prox config test command
description: Add config validation command that tests connection, authentication, API version, and node access. Provides clear pass/fail feedback.
